DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate response immune system hepatitis B ( HB ) vaccine healthy adult 50 70 year age . This study partially fund National Institute Allergy Infectious Diseases .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Immune Response Heplisav Healthy Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine immune system respond vaccination HEPLISAV .
DOC.criteria: 50 70 year age , inclusive In good health opinion principal investigator , base upon medical history physical examination Serum negative HBsAg , antiHBs , antibody hepatitis B core antigen ( antiHBc ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) If female childbearing potential , agree consistently use highly effective method birth control screen visit Week 12/Visit 10 Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan pregnancy Known history autoimmune disease Previously receive hepatitis B vaccine ( approved investigational ) Bodymass index ( BMI ) > 30 kg/m2 , diabetes mellitus ( type 1 2 ) , chronic medical condition opinion principal investigator might interfere immune response hepatitis B vaccination
